name: Gear Loop
description:
"An end is a new beginning", that's why life always finds a way.

This is (a very short) parkour/platformer game that was so fun to create! (It's all spaghetti code by now but "If it ain't broke, it's working" am I right?)

I made this for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 and soon™ I'll make a video on how I did it.

Music by Context Sensitive!
